name: 汪家昌
objective: 快速原型加工原理、快速原型系統分類、加工參數與加工結果分析，製程設備研究，快速模具技術研究，快速原型與快速模具實習，專題研究與討論。
schedule:
week 1. The Development of Rapid Prototyping Systems
week 2. Classification of RPM (Laser, Nozzle)
week 3. Photo-Polymerization Fabrication Process
week 3. Basic knowledge of photo-polymerization
week 3,4. SLA-Solid Imaging; SLP, EDART; SGC; Others
week 5. Nozzle type Polymerization Fabrication Process 
week 5. Basic knowledge of liner polymer Thermal Plastic polymerization
week 6. Thermal jet, MM, FDM
week 7. Powder Fabrication Process 
week 7. Basic knowledge of metallurgy
week 7,8. SLS, EOS, 3DP, LENS 
week 9. Alternative Fabrication Process
week 9. Basic knowledge of cutting
week 9. LOM, SDM
week 10. mid-exam
week 11. Micro RP, 3D Micro Fabrication (Micro-Stereolithography: LCD, DLP, Dynamic Photo Mask)
week 12,13. Rapid Tooling and Rapid Manufacturing
week 14. Applications (Industrial, Medical, Potential)
week 15-18. Software for RP, the slicing technique (Program in BCB)
scorePolicy:
平時表現 30%
期中考   30%
期末報告 40%
materials: 至http://3dt.me.ntut.edu.tw網頁註冊，得以下載投影片教材、上傳作業、及與授課教授線上討論互動
